text: The Cyber Security Task Force is organized under the department of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness Canada. Jane Billings, Assistant Deputy Minister, is the current Cyber Security Task Force Secretariat. ==See also== * Computer security * Canadian Cyber Incident Response Centre ==External links== * Margaret Bloodworth (speaker's notes) Ottawa, Ontario (January 19, 2005) * PSEPC Position Paper (November 2004) * Treasury Board Spending * Paul Martin: New Funding Initiatives (April 27, 2004) * ITWorld: Making Haste Slowly Richard Bray (November 4, 2005) ==References== Category:Canadian federal departments and agencies Category:Computer security organizations
title: Cyber Security Task Force
